name: FrostReleased
commands: Oh my! Thank you so much!
We're in a predicament here, could you lend us a hand?
Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured.
Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
Frost, a pleasure to meet you, Sal.|I will lend Arcei my aid for the time being.
Oh my! Thank you so much!
We're in a predicament here, could you lend us a hand?
Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured.
Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
Frost, a pleasure to meet you, Sal.|I will lend Arcei my aid for the time being.
Oh my! Thank you so much!
Of course, fair maiden!|A true noble always offers his aid to one as sweet as thee!
Forgive my Lords... quirks.|We need help right now, so could you return us the favour, please?
Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured!
Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
And I, Sages, prince of Arcei.
Wow, a real life prince... I am Frost, glad to offer my aid.
Sh! A pleasure to have you, Frost.
Oh my! Thank you so much!
Of course, Ma'am.|Could you help our army fight these violent fugitives?
I can't fight, but I will help heal your injured.
source:
if;unit2.nid == 'Sal'
    music;With Us!
    multi_add_portrait;Frost;Left;Sal;Right
    speak;Frost;Oh my! Thank you so much!
    speak;Sal;Of course, glad to help.
    speak;Frost;However can I repay you?
    speak;Sal;We're in a predicament here, could you lend us a hand?
    speak;Frost;Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured.
    speak;Sal;Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
    speak;Frost;Frost, a pleasure to meet you, Sal.|I will lend Arcei my aid for the time being.
    speak;Sal;Welcome aboard!
    multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Frost
    change_team;Frost;player
    reset;Frost
elif;unit2.nid != 'Sal' and unit2.team == 'player'
    music;With Us!
    multi_add_portrait;Frost;Left;Sal;FarRight;{unit2};MidRight
    speak;Frost;Oh my! Thank you so much!
    speak;{unit2};Of course, glad to help.
    speak;Frost;However can I repay you?
    speak;Sal;We're in a predicament here, could you lend us a hand?
    speak;Frost;Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured.
    speak;Sal;Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
    speak;Frost;Frost, a pleasure to meet you, Sal.|I will lend Arcei my aid for the time being.
    speak;{Unit2};Welcome aboard!
    multi_remove_portrait;Sal;{unit2};Frost
    change_team;Frost;player
    reset;Frost
elif;unit2.team == 'other'
    multi_add_portrait;Frost;Left;Sal;FarRight;Sages;Right
    music;With Us!
    speak;Frost;Oh my! Thank you so much!
    speak;Sages;Of course, fair maiden!|A true noble always offers his aid to one as sweet as thee!
    speak;Frost;Uhm, oh. Well that's...
    speak;Sal;Forgive my Lords... quirks.|We need help right now, so could you return us the favour, please?
    speak;Frost;Oh... I, well...|I can't fight, but I can heal your injured!
    speak;Sal;Good enough for me, I didn't catch your name?|I am Sal, knight of Arcei.
    speak;Sages;And I, Sages, prince of Arcei.
    speak;Frost;Wow, a real life prince... I am Frost, glad to offer my aid.
    speak;Sages;Welcome aboard, my dearest sunflower-{c:bop_portrait;Sages;FLAG(no_block)}|Yeowch!
    speak;Sal;Sh! A pleasure to have you, Frost.
    multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Sages;Frost
    change_team;Frost;player
else
    multi_add_portrait;Frost;Left;SoldierRed;Right
    speak;Frost;Oh my! Thank you so much!
    speak;SoldierRed;Of course, Ma'am.|Could you help our army fight these violent fugitives?
    speak;Frost;I can't fight, but I will help heal your injured.
    speak;SoldierRed;Thank you, Ma'am.
    multi_remove_portrait;Frost;SoldierRed
    change_team;Frost;enemy
end
